properties.name: nosql.type
properties.description: Datastore type. Valid values are: dynamodb, cosmosdb and redis

properties.name: nosql.table
properties.description: The name of the table to contain the item.

properties.name: nosql.endpoint
properties.description: Sets the Azure Cosmos DB endpoint the SDK will connect to

properties.name: nosql.key
properties.description: Sets either a master or readonly Azure Cosmos DB key used to perform authentication for accessing resource.

properties.name: nosql.database
properties.description: Sets the Azure Cosmos DB database id

properties.name: nosql.container
properties.description: Sets the Azure Cosmos DB container instance
